postInstallNotes:
Datadog on DCOS successfully installed.
Head over to https://app.datadoghq.com to monitor your DCOS cluster.
name: datadog
preInstallNotes:
Pass your API key as a package option (datadog.api_key).
Also pass the number of Mesos slaves as an option (datadog.instances).
Marathon will make sure that the Datadog Agent runs only once per slave.
